item.title: Tech Stack Retro (2021)
item.description: Also, hello (again)! It’s been almost 4 years since I last touched anything to do with my personal site, with the good old excuse of laziness, work, other stuff to do, no stuff to do, and trying to figure out how to be a (barely) functional adult in this world.

item.title: How I got customized personal emails, a domain, and a website for 11 dollars a year
item.description: The following post contains a bunch of specific details on how I managed to get free custom domain emails and a website on the internet with my only ongoing cost being the domain name.

item.title: A Canadian Existential Crisis Introduction
item.description: An introduction to the site with an explanation of the stack and why they were chosen
